name: [Fastly] High volume of requests triggering a Web Application Firewall rule on service: {{service.name}}
query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:fastly.waf_logged{*} by {service}, 'agile', 2, direction='above', interval=60, alert_window='last_15m', count_default_zero='true', seasonality='hourly') >= 1
message:
There is a high volume of requests triggering a Web Application Firewall rule on {{service.name}}. The value of {{value}} is higher than normal and may be a result of a DDOS attack.

To help troubleshoot:

- Ensure that <https://status.fastly.com/> is all green
- Check the Fastly Dashboard: https://app.datadoghq.com/dash/integration/43/fastly---overview
